pyresparser.utils.extract_education(nlp_text)¶

Helper function to extract education from spacy nlp text

Parameters:nlp_text – object of spacy.tokens.doc.Doc
Returns:tuple of education degree and year if year if found else only returns education degree
pyresparser.utils.extract_email(text)¶

Helper function to extract email id from text

Parameters:text – plain text extracted from resume file
pyresparser.utils.extract_entities_wih_custom_model(custom_nlp_text)¶

Helper function to extract different entities with custom trained model using SpaCy’s NER

Parameters:custom_nlp_text – object of spacy.tokens.doc.Doc
Returns:dictionary of entities

Helper function to extract all the raw text from sections of resume specifically for graduates and undergraduates

Parameters:text – Raw text of resume
Returns:dictionary of entities

Helper function to extract name from spacy nlp text

Parameters:
  • nlp_text – object of spacy.tokens.doc.Doc
  • matcher – object of spacy.matcher.Matcher
Returns:

string of full name

Helper function to extract skills from spacy nlp text

Parameters:
  • nlp_text – object of spacy.tokens.doc.Doc
  • noun_chunks – noun chunks extracted from nlp text
Returns:

list of skills extracted
pyresparser.utils.extract_text(file_path, extension)¶

Wrapper function to detect the file extension and call text extraction function accordingly

Parameters:
  • file_path – path of file of which text is to be extracted
  • extension – extension of file file_name
pyresparser.utils.extract_text_from_doc(doc_path)¶

Helper function to extract plain text from .doc files

Parameters:doc_path – path to .doc file to be extracted
Returns:string of extracted text
pyresparser.utils.extract_text_from_docx(doc_path)¶

Helper function to extract plain text from .docx files

Parameters:doc_path – path to .docx file to be extracted
Returns:string of extracted text
pyresparser.utils.extract_text_from_pdf(pdf_path)¶

Helper function to extract the plain text from .pdf files

Parameters:pdf_path – path to PDF file to be extracted (remote or local)
Returns:iterator of string of extracted text

Helper function to extract total months of experience from a resume

Parameters:
  • date1 – Starting date
  • date2 – Ending date
Returns:

months of experience from date1 to date2
